heading: HR00863
0:
A RESOLUTION URGING THE HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES,
THROUGH THE COMMITTEE ON LEGISLATIVE FRANCHISES, TO
ADMONISH THE NATIONAL TELECOMMUNICATIONS COMMISSION
ON ITS FAILURE TO COMPLY WITH THEIR COMMITMENT UNDER
OATH AND TO CONDUCT AN INQUIRY, IN AID OF LEGISLATION, ON
THE SAME AND ON POSSIBLE MEASURES TO BE TAKEN ON THE
MATTER
status: Pending with the Committee on LEGISLATIVE FRANCHISES since 2020-05-27
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HR00863
FULL TITLE : A RESOLUTION URGING THE HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES, THROUGH THE COMMITTEE ON LEGISLATIVE FRANCHISES, TO ADMONISH THE NATIONAL TELECOMMUNICATIONS COMMISSION ON ITS FAILURE TO COMPLY WITH THEIR COMMITMENT UNDER OATH AND TO CONDUCT AN INQUIRY, IN AID OF LEGISLATION, ON THE SAME AND ON POSSIBLE MEASURES TO BE TAKEN ON THE MATTER
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : SARMIENTO, EDGAR S.
DATE FILED : 2020-05-13
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON LEGISLATIVE FRANCHISES ON 2020-05-27
SECONDARILY REFERRED TO THE COMMITTEE(S) ON GOOD GOVERNMENT AND PUBLIC ACCOUNTABILITY
PREVIOUS COMMITTEE REFERRALS :PRIMARILY REFERRED TO RULES on 2020-05-18;
